member.name: T:Tao.Cg.Cg
member.summary: Cg core runtime binding for .NET, implementing Cg 1.2.1.
member.remarks: Binds functions and definitions in cg.dll or libcg.so.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_STRUCT
member.summary: A collection of one or more members of possibly different types.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_ARRAY
member.summary: A collection of one or more elements of the same type.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_TYPE_START_ENUM
member.summary: Start of the Cg data type definitions.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_HALF
member.summary: The half type is lower-precision IEEE-like floating point. Profiles must support the half type, but may choose to implement it with the same precision as the float type.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_FLOAT
member.summary: The float type is as close as possible to the IEEE single precision (32-bit) floating point. Profiles must support the float data type.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_SAMPLER1D
member.summary: A handle to a 1-dimensional texture object.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_SAMPLER2D
member.summary: A handle to a 2-dimensional texture object.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_SAMPLER3D
member.summary: A handle to a 3-dimensional texture object.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_SAMPLERRECT
member.summary: A handle to a texture object rectangle.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_SAMPLERCUBE
member.summary: A handle to a texture object cube map.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_FIXED
member.summary: The fixed type is a signed type with a range of at least [-2,2) and with at least 10 bits of fractional precision. Overflow operations on the data type clamp rather than wrap. Fragment profiles must support the fixed type, but may implement it with the same precision as the half or float types. Vertex profiles are required to provide partial support for the fixed type. Vertex profiles have the option to provide full support for the fixed type or to implement the fixed type with the same precision as the half or float types.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_INT
member.summary: The int type is preferably 32-bit twoâ€™s complement. Profiles may optionally treat int as float.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_BOOL
member.summary: The bool type represents Boolean values. Objects of bool type are either true or false.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_INOUT
member.summary: Specifies a parameter that is both input and output.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_MIXED
member.summary: A structure parameter that contains parameters that differ in variability.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_VARYING
member.summary: A varying parameter is one whose value changes with each invocation of the program.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_UNIFORM
member.summary: A uniform parameter is one whose value does not chance with each invocation of a program, but whose value can change between groups of program invocations.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_CONSTANT
member.summary: A constant parameter never changes for the life of a compiled program. Modifying a constant parameter requires program recompilation.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_PROGRAM_ENTRY
member.summary: The main entry point for the program.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_COMPILED_PROGRAM
member.summary: The string for the compiled program.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_DEFAULT
member.summary: The default values for a uniform parameter.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_SOURCE
member.summary: A string that contains Cg source code.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_OBJECT
member.summary: A string that contains object code that resulted from the precompilation of some Cg source code.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_PROGRAM_NOT_LOADED_ERROR
member.summary: The program must be loaded before this operation may be used.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_UNSUPPORTED_GL_EXTENSION_ERROR
member.summary: An unsupported GL extension was required to perform this operation.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_INVALID_VALUE_TYPE_ERROR
member.summary: An unknown value type was assigned to a parameter.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_NOT_MATRIX_PARAM_ERROR
member.summary: The parameter is not of matrix type.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_INVALID_ENUMERANT_ERROR
member.summary: The enumerant parameter has an invalid value.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_NOT_4x4_MATRIX_ERROR
member.summary: The parameter must be a 4x4 matrix type.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_FILE_READ_ERROR
member.summary: The file could not be read.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_FILE_WRITE_ERROR
member.summary: The file could not be written.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_NVPARSE_ERROR
member.summary: nvparse could not successfully parse the output from the Cg compiler backend.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_VAR_ARG_ERROR
member.summary: The variable arguments were specified incorrectly.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_ARRAY_PARAM_ERROR
member.summary: The parameter must be an array.

member.name: F:Tao.Cg.Cg.CG_OUT_OF_ARRAY_BOUNDS_ERROR
member.summary: Index into the array is out of bounds.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgCreateContext
member.summary: Creates a new Cg context to use.
member.returns: A handle to the newly created Cg context.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgDestroyContext(System.IntPtr)
member.param: Handle to the Cg context to destroy.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgIsContext(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Given the specified context handle, returns true if it is a valid Cg context.
member.param: Handle of the context to check.
member.returns: CG_TRUE if valid, CG_FALSE otherwise.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetLastListing(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the compiler output from the results of the most recent program compilation for the given Cg context.
member.param: Handle to the context to query.
member.returns: String representing compiler output from last program compiled.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetLastListingA(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the compiler output from the results of the most recent program compilation for the given Cg context.
member.param: Handle to the context to query.
member.returns: IntPtr that must be converted to a string with Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgCopyProgram(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Makes a copy of the specified Cg program within the same context.
member.param: Handle to the program to copy.
member.returns: Handle to a new program within the same context.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgCreateProgram(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Compiles and creates a Cg program.
member.param: Current Cg context.
Type of source to use.
Source Cg code.
Profile to use for compiling the program.
Entry point of the specified Cg source. If null, then 'main' is assumed.
Optional args to pass to the compiler.
member.returns: Handle to the newly created Cg program.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgCreateProgramFromFile(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a Cg program from the specified file.
member.param: Current Cg context.
Type of source to use.
Name of the file to load and compile.
Profile to use for compiling the program.
Entry point of the specified Cg source. If null, then 'main' is assumed.
Optional args to pass to the compiler.
member.returns: Handle to the newly created Cg program.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgDestroyProgram(System.IntPtr)
member.param: Handle to the program to destroy.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetProgramString(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the specified source from the program.
member.param: Handle to the Cg program.
Type of source to pull, whether original or compiled, etc.
member.returns: String containing the source of the specified type from the program.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetProgramStringA(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the specified source from the program.
member.param: Handle to the Cg program.
Type of source to pull, whether original or compiled, etc.
member.returns: IntPtr to the string data. Must be converted using Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetFirstProgram(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the first program in a context.
member.param: The context to retreive first program from.
member.returns: The program or null if no programs available.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetNextProgram(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Iterate trough programs in a context.
member.param: Current program.
member.returns: Next program in context's internal sequence of programs.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetProgramContext(System.IntPtr)
member.param: Program to retreive context from.
member.returns: The context a given program belongs to.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgIsProgram(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Determine if a program handle references a Cg program object.
member.param: The program handle.
member.returns: CG_TRUE if prog references a valid program object.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgCompileProgram(System.IntPtr)
member.param: The program to be compiled or inspected.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterType(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the data type of the specified parameter.
member.param: Id of the parameter to query.
member.returns: Enum value representing the parameter's data type.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgIsProgramCompiled(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Determines if a program has been compiled.
member.param: Specifies the program.
member.returns: CG_TRUE if specified program has been compiled.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetProgramProfile(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the profile enumeration of the program.
member.param: Specifies the program.
member.returns: The profile enumeration or CG_PROFILE_UNKNOWN if compilation failed.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetProfile(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a profile enum value based on the string representation of the profile.
member.param: Name of the profile, i.e. arbvp1, vs_1_1, etc.
member.returns: Enum value containing the integral representation of the profile.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetNamedParameter(System.IntPtr,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the named parameter from the program.
member.param: The program to get parameter from.
The name of the parameter to return.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetFirstLeafParameter(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Used to get the first leaf parameter from the specified program.
member.remarks: Leaf params read into params that are structs as well, eliminating the need to explictly determine if the param is a struct or other type.
member.param: Handle to the program to query.
Namespace in which to query for the params (usually CG_PROGRAM).
member.returns: Handle to the first Cg parameter in the specified program.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetNextLeafParameter(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets a handle to the leaf parameter directly following the specified param.
member.param: Current Cg parameter.
member.returns: Handle to the next param after the current program, null if the current is the last param.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterDirection(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the direction of this parameter, i.e. CG_IN, CG_OUT, CG_INOUT.
member.param: Id of the parameter to query.
member.returns: Enum value representing the parameter's direction.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterName(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the name of the specified program.
member.param: Handle to the program to query.
member.returns: The name of the specified program as a string.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterNameA(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the name of the specified program.
member.param: Handle to the program to query.
member.returns: IntPtr that must be converted to an Ansi string via Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterResourceIndex(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Retrieves the index of the specifed parameter according to its type and variability.
member.remarks: For example, if the resource for a given parameter is CG_TEXCOORD7, cgGetParameterResourceIndex() returns 7. Also, for uniform params, it equates to the constant index that will be used in the resulting program.
member.param: Handle of the param to query.
member.returns: Index of the specified parameter according to its type and variability.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterVariability(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the variability of the specified param (i.e, uniform, varying, etc).
member.param: Handle of the program to query.
member.returns: Enum stating the variability of the program.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgIsParameterReferenced(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Queries whether the specified program will be used in the final compiled program.
member.remarks: The compiler may ignore parameters that are not actually used within the program.
member.param: Handle to the Cg parameter.
member.returns: True if the param is being used, false if not.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterResource(System.IntPtr)
member.param: Parameter to retreive resource from
member.returns: Resource of a given parameter.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterBaseResource(System.IntPtr)
member.param: Parameter to retreive base resource from
member.returns: Base resource of a given parameter.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetFirstParameter(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the first parameter in specified program.
member.param: The program to retreive the first program from.
Namespace of the parameter to iterate through.
member.returns: First parameter in specified program.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetNextParameter(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Iterates to next parameter in program.
member.param: The current parameter.
member.returns: The next parameter in the program's internal sequence of parameters.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetFirstStructParameter(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the first child parameter in a struct parameter.
member.param: The struct parameter to get child parameter from.
member.returns: First child parameter in specified struct parameter.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetArrayParameter(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the parameter from an array.
member.param: Array parameter.
Index into the array.
member.returns: Parameter of array param specified by the index.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetArrayDimension(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the dimension of an array parameter.
member.param: Parameter.
member.returns: Dimension of the specified parameter.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetArraySize(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the size of an array.
member.param: Parameter.
The dimension whose size will be returned.
member.returns: Size of specified parameters dimension.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterProgram(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets program that specified parameter belongs to.
member.param: Parameter to retreive it's parent program.
member.returns: A program given parameter belongs to.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgIsParameter(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Determines if parameter is valid Cg parameter object.
member.param: Parameter.
member.returns: CG_TRUE ig parameter is valid Cg parameter object.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterSemantic(System.IntPtr)
member.param: Parameter to get semantic from.
member.returns: Parameter's semantic string.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterValues(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32[])
member.param: Parameter to retreive parameter's values from.
CG_CONSTANT or CG?DEFAULT
Array of integers indicating the number of values in parameters.
member.returns: Array of double values.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterValues(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32*)
member.param: Parameter to retreive parameter's values from.
CG_CONSTANT or CG?DEFAULT
Array of integers indicating the number of values in parameters.
member.returns: Array of double values.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterValues(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.IntPtr)
member.param: Parameter to retreive parameter's values from.
CG_CONSTANT or CG?DEFAULT
Array of integers indicating the number of values in parameters.
member.returns: Array of double values.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetParameterOrdinalNumber(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Returns an integer that represents the position of a parameter when it was declared within the Cg program.
member.param: Parameter to retreive it's ordinal number.
member.returns: Parameter's ordinal number.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetResourceString(System.Int32)
member.summary: get the resource name associated with a resource enumerant
member.param: Resource ID to get name from.
member.returns: Resource's name.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetResource(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the resource enumerant assigned to a resource name.
member.param: Resource's name.
member.returns: Resource enumerant.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetError
member.summary: Returns an error enum if an error has occured in the last Cg method call.
member.returns: Error enum.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetErrorString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an error description from the specified error enum value.
member.param: Error enum value.
member.returns: String description of the specified error enum value.

member.name: M:Tao.Cg.Cg.cgGetErrorStringA(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an error description from the specified error enum value.
member.param: Error enum value.
member.returns: IntPtr that must be converted to Ansi string via Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi.
